mapper.insert: insert into chas_xt_sswpxg (ID, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, SSWPGID, BH, MC, RYBH, SB_ID,sbgn,boxlx ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sswpgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{sbgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update chas_xt_sswpxg set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), BAQID = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAQMC = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSWPGID = #{sswpgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BH = #{bh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MC = #{mc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYBH = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SB_ID = #{sbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sbgn= #{sbgn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, boxlx= #{boxlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, SSWPGID, BH, MC, RYBH, SB_ID, SBGN,boxlx from chas_xt_sswpxg where isdel = 0 and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from chas_xt_sswpxg
1=1 and isdel = 0
and SSWPGID = '${sswpgid}'
and id in
'${item}'
and BAQID = '${baqid}'
and SB_ID = '${sbid}'
and BH = '${bh}'
and BAQID in
'${item}'

select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, SSWPGID, BH, MC, RYBH, SB_ID, SBGN,boxlx from chas_xt_sswpxg
1=1 and isdel = 0
and SB_ID = '${sbid}'

select distinct xg.* from chas_xt_sswpxg xg where not exists ( select cwg_id from chas_yw_ryjl jl where jl.rybh in ( select rybh from gg_baqryxx ry where ry.baqid in
'${item}'
and ry.ryzt != '04' and ry.isdel = '0') and jl.ryzt = '1' and jl.isdel = '0' and xg.sb_id = jl.cwg_id) and xg.sbgn = '1' union select distinct xg.* from chas_xt_sswpxg xg where not exists ( select cwg_id from chas_yw_ryjl jl where jl.rybh in ( select rybh from gg_baqryxx ry where ry.baqid in
'${item}'
and ry.ryzt != '04' and ry.isdel = '0') and jl.ryzt = '1' and jl.isdel = '0' and xg.sb_id = jl.cwg_id) and xg.sbgn = '40'
select xg.*,ryjl.xm from chas_xt_sswpxg xg left join chas_yw_ryjl ryjl on ryjl.cwg_id=xg.sb_id and ryjl.isdel=0 where xg.isdel = 0 and xg.sbgn='1' and xg.baqid='${baqid}'
